content: The view from the 14th floor was amazing, and I especially loved looking out at the city lights at night. As for noise, I didn't really notice any issues. My room was pretty quiet, and I slept well every night. One thing I did notice was that my room number was 1414, which I thought was kind of cool. Anyway, I'm thinking of planning a trip to New York City soon. Do you have any hotel recommendations in Midtown?
